item.title: Lady Antebellum - Need You Now
item.description:
Picture-perfect
memories
Scattered all around
the floor
Reaching for
the phone
‘Cause I can’t
fight it anymore
And I wonder if I ever
cross your mind
For me it happens
all the time
It’s a quarter
after one
I’m all alone
and I need you now
Said
I wouldn’t call
But I lost all control
and I need you now
And I don’t know
how I can do without
I just need you
now
Another
shot of whiskey
Can’t stop
looking at the door
Wishing you’d come
sweeping
In the way
you did before
And I wonder if I ever
cross your mind
For me it happens
all the time
It’s a quarter
after one
I’m a little drunk
and I need you now
Said
I wouldn’t call
But I lost all control
and I need you now
And I don’t know
how I can do without
I just need you
now

Yes I’d rather
hurt than
Feel nothing
at all
It’s a quarter
after one
I’m all alone
and I need you now
And I said
I wouldn’t call
But I’m a little drunk
and I need you now
And I don’t know
how I can do without
I just need you now
I just need you now
Oh baby
I need you now
